How to Play

  1. Choose a quiz
  2. Identify the correct answer
  3. Get 5 out of 5 in at least 3 quizzes to post a total time

Prizes

Each month there will be three new prizes for the top three players.

Rules

  • The aim of the game is to finish the quizzes in the fastest time possible.
  • There is a time limit in which to complete the quiz, keep an eye out for the time limit at the top of the screen
  • Once you have completed at least 3 quizzes your total time will be calculated.
  • Your total time will always be updated with your three lowest times.
  • At the end of the month the 3 players with the lowest total times will be named the winners of the current month's quiz.
  • There will be a top prize for the winner and two other prizes for second and third place.
